1.Android is a mobile os developed by Google. 2.Android is based on the open source os Linux. 3.The word Android refers only to a male robot. 4.The first Android prototype looked a lot like a apple. 5.Android was first created as an os for digital cameras. 6.Android controls 88% of the world smartphone market. 7.Android is so expensive when its is developed. 8.There is a Android running device in space! 9.Android is Andy Rubin who is the co-creator of Android. 10.Android was developed in 2001 by Android Inc
